CodeplexIssue.Title: Exception while using custom Enumerators
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml: an issue is reported by ngx.   http://netoffice.codeplex.com/discussions/281614   custom enumerators use a wrong array range in NetOffice, as outcome an exception was thrown. task: change used array range and make sure it works good.

CodeplexComment.Author: SebastianDotNet
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml: issue fixed. an upated release is available. *have a nice day
